metadata.title: CVE-2018-18838 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Netdata 1.10.0. Log Injection (or Log Forgery)exists via a %0a sequence in the url parameter to api/v1/registry.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

netdata - 1.9.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
netdata-data - 1.9.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: netdata package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
